name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: App for WhatsApp and Messenger access
name.ja: LINEマルチメッセンジャー

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: We gather all messenger in one app. Opens WhatsApp in the browser just in 1 click as well as other chats
short.da: Nem adgang til WhatsApp, Line, Telegram, FB Messenger og mange flere via Chrome værktøjslinjen.
short.de: Einfacher Zugriff auf WhatsApp, Line, Telegram, FB Messenger und viele mehr über die Chrome-Symbolleiste.
short.es: Fácil acceso a WhatsApp, Line, Telegram, FB Messenger y muchos más a través de la barra de herramientas de Chrome.
short.fr: Accès facile à WhatsApp, Line, Telegram, FB Messenger et bien d'autres via la barre d'outils Chrome.
short.he: גישה קלה ל WhatsApp, קו, מברק, FB Messenger ועוד רבים באמצעות סרגל הכלים של Chrome.
short.hi: क्रोम टूलबार के माध्यम से व्हाट्सएप, लाइन, टेलीग्राम, एफबी मैसेंजर और कई अन्य लोगों तक आसान पहुंच।
short.ja: LINE、WhatsApp、Telegram、FB MessengerなどのChromeツールバーに簡単にアクセスできます
short.ko: Chrome 툴바를 통해 LINE, WhatsApp, Telegram, FB Messenger 등 다양한 기능에 쉽게 액세스 할 수 있습니다.
short.ml: Akses mudah ke LINE, WeChat, WhatsApp, Telegram, FB Messenger dan banyak lagi melalui toolbar Chrome
short.no: Enkel tilgang til WhatsApp, Line, Telegram, FB Messenger, WeChat og mange flere via Chrome verktøylinje.
short.pt_BR: Fácil acesso ao WhatsApp, Line, Telegrama, FB Messenger, WeChat e muitos mais através da barra de ferramentas do Chrome.
short.ru: Быстрый запуск Web Telegram и других чатов прямо из браузера
short.th: เข้าถึง LINE, WeChat, WhatsApp, Telegram, FB Messenger และอื่น ๆ อีกมากมายผ่านทางแถบเครื่องมือของ Chrome
short.vi: Dễ dàng truy cập vào WhatsApp, Line, Telegram, FB Messenger, WeChat và nhiều thứ khác thông qua thanh công cụ Chrome.
short.zh_CN: 通过Chrome工具栏轻松访问WeChat,LINE, WhatsApp, Telegram，FB Messenge等等。
short.zh_TW: 通过Chrome工具栏轻松访问WeChat, WhatsApp，Line，Telegram，FB Messenge等等。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
App for Whatsapp and Messenger access is a fast way to send and read messages from most popular chats that you use every day. 

During your surfing the web and opening other web pages, simply click to the extension button and window chat will be show on the current page. 
It is an irreplaceable assistant with:

- Support desktop notifications, so you will be always notified about new messages even when you aren’t checking the web page.

-  Fast Launch for communication websites
